event.title: several budget changes during a meeting Wednesday

data.event: TORRINGTON â€” City Council tentatively approved several budget changes during a meeting Wednesday, that would affect recycling and winter maintenance supplies for the 2009-10 fiscal year.

event.title: Last week the council unanimously approved

data.event: Last week the council unanimously approved the switch to the new system, which would allow residents to combine recyclables in the same bin.
